revision.text:
{{for|mechanics in other games|Phys Def Down}} {{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Phys. Def. Down |caption = Reduces Physical Defense. |image = XC3 Phys. Defense Down.png |type = Debuff |attribute = Physical |base-duration = 15.0s |max-duration = 30.0s |success-rate = 75% |rng-applicable = Yes |effect-title-1 = Base Phys. Def. Decrease |effect-value-1 = 25% of magnitude (see Calculations) }} '''Phys. Def. Down''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It reduces the affected character's physical defense.
==Calculations== The way that Phys. Def. Down interacts with a character's physical defense depends on the sign of the character's Physical Defense: *If the character's Physical Defense is zero, then Phys. Def. Down has no effect on their Physical Defense (though it still counts as a debuff for Arts and skills that rely on debuffs). *If the character's Physical Defense is positive, then Phys. Def. Down reduces the magnitude of positive Physical Defense. For example, a character with 20% Physical Defense will lose 5% with the base debuff, for a final Physical Defense of 15%. *If the character's Physical Defense is negative, then Phys. Def. Down increases the magnitude of negative Physical Defense; for example, a -20% Physical Defense loses 5% for a final value of -25% with the base debuff.
A calculation that combines these three cases can be obtained by taking the magnitude of Physical Defense:
<math>PhysDef = BasePhysDef - PhysDefDownStrength \times |BasePhysDef|,</math>
where <math>BasePhysDef</math> is the initial Physical Defense and <math>PhysDefDownStrength</math> is the strength of the debuff.
==Distribution== ===Arts=== *[[No Love Lost (XC3)|No Love Lost]] ([[Strategos]]) *[[Double Slap]] ([[Soulhacker]]; requires Soul Hacking [[Saberly Dorampé]]) *[[Elimination Beam]] (Soulhacker; requires Soul Hacking [[Clinging Azreel]]) *[[Hellbound (XC3)|Hellbound]] ([[Sena]]'s [[Ouroboros]])
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}

[[file:Kadar Pippito.png|thumb|Kadar Pippito]] '''Pippitos''' are a family of enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}, first appearing in {{XC2}}. They are small rodent or ferret-like critters, reminiscent of [[Hox]]es or [[Terebra]]s. Pippitos come in orange and purple varieties.
== {{XC2|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Aplom Pippito]] * [[Felusi Pippito (XC2)|Felusi Pippito]] * [[Graaz Pippito]] * [[Kadar Pippito]] * [[Leap Pippito (XC2)|Leap Pippito]] * [[Mahi Pippito]] * [[Mia Pippito (XC2)|Mia Pippito]] * [[Misdan Pippito]] * [[Nelva Pippito (XC2)|Nelva Pippito]] * [[Neml Pippito (XC2)|Neml Pippito]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Chickenheart Dagmara]] ([[Superboss]]) * [[Enlightened Morris]]
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemies === * [[Bandette Pippito]] * [[Covn Pippito]] * [[Seeth Pippito]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Arcah Pippito]] * [[Teppus Pippito]] * [[Xane Pippito]]
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Felusi Pippito (XC3)|Felusi Pippito]] * [[Floof Pippito]] * [[Leap Pippito (XC3)|Leap Pippito]] * [[Mia Pippito (XC3)|Mia Pippito]] * [[Nelva Pippito (XC3)|Nelva Pippito]] * [[Neml Pippito (XC3)|Neml Pippito]] * [[Pixidan Pippito]] * [[Polka Pippito]] * [[Prithee Pippito]] * [[Qutorl Pippito]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Medica Pippito]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Shimmering Marcko]]
=== Quest Exclusive Boss === * [[Depriti Pippito]] (During ''[[Unspeakable Being]]'')
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Felusi Pippito (XC3)|Felusi Pippito]] * [[Snow Pippito]] * [[White Pippito]]
== Gallery == <gallery> XC2 Chickenheart Dagmara.png|Chickenheart Dagmara TeppusPippito.jpg|Teppus Pippito Snow Pippito.jpg|Snow Pippito White Pippito.jpg|White Pippito </gallery>

[[file:Colony Piranhax.jpg|thumb|Piranhax model]] '''Piranhax''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|サモン}}, ''Samon'', Salmon) are aquatic type enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They are piranha-like creatures, identical in all but colour, and may be related, to [[Sardi]].
Piranhax undergo no appearance changes between games, although brown Piranhax - categorized in {{XC}} as Sardi - are seen in {{XC2}} and {{TTGC}}.
== {{XC|-}} == Piranhax are found mainly on [[Bionis]], although there is one type found on [[Fallen Arm]].
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Pawn Piranhax]] * [[Colony Piranhax]] * [[Fair Piranhax]] * [[Leg Piranhax]] * [[Makna Piranhax]]
== {{XCFC|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Colony Piranhax]]
== {{XC2|-}} == Piranhax can be found in the [[Gormott Province]].
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Emerald Piranhax]] * [[Ghastly Piranhax]] * [[King Piranhax]] * [[Prom Piranhax]] * [[Svena Piranhax]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Anguished Solomon]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Maramal Piranhax]] * [[Reed Piranhax]]
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Foggy Piranhax]] * [[Inuma Piranhax]] * [[Masrah Piranhax]] * [[Onogoro Piranhax]] * [[Plush Piranhax]] * [[Sol Piranhax]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Gushing Masquin]] * [[Repulsive Deepus]] * [[Wraithfin Segna]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Inuma Piranhax]] * [[Masrah Piranhax]] * [[Onogoro Piranhax]]
=== Quest Exclusive Boss === * [[Zalmor Piranhax]] (During ''[[The Very Lost Nopon]]'')
== Gallery == === {{TTGC|-}} === <gallery> ReedPiranhax.png|Reed Piranhax MaramalPiranhax.jpg|Maramal Piranhax </gallery>
=== {{XC3|-}} === <gallery> Foggy Piranhax.png|Foggy Piranhax Onogoro_Piranhax.jpg|Onogoro Piranhax XC3 Repulsive Deepus.png|Repulsive Deepus </gallery>

[[file:Plambus3.jpg|thumb|Tolmeda Plambus]] '''Plambuses''' are a family of enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They resemble gigantic flying beetles and come in green and red varieties, the latter exclusive to the [[Kingdom of Torna]].
== {{XC2|-}} == In {{XC2}}, Plambuses can only be found in the [[Kingdom of Tantal]]. === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Tolmeda Plambus]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Incandescent Marcus]]
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemies === * [[Scalpe Plambus]] * [[Tygrelyle Plambus]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == In {{TTGC}}, only one variety of Plambus can be found. === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Grohl Plambus]]
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Kassis Plambus]] * [[Lodmoro Plambus]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Sweet Plambus]] (During ''[[A More Balanced Recipe]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Demonic Krenolur]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Lodmoro Plambus]]
== Gallery == <gallery> Plambus2.jpg|Tolmeda Plambus GrohlPlambus3.jpg|Grohl Plambus XC3 Demonic Krenolur.jpeg|Demonic Krenolur </gallery> [[Category:XC2 Plambuses]] [[Category:XC2 Species]] [[Category:XC2 Insects]] [[Category:XC2 Aerial Creatures]] [[Category:TTGC Plambuses]] [[Category:TTGC Species]] [[Category:TTGC Insects]] [[Category:TTGC Aerial Creatures]] [[Category:XC3 Plambuses]] [[Category:XC3 Species]] [[Category:XC3 Aerial Life]] [[Category:XC3FR Plambuses]] [[Category:XC3FR Species]] [[Category:XC3FR Aerial Life]] [[Category:Plambuses]] [[Category:Species by Type]]
